CustomField.formula: IF (OR( ISPICKVAL(Reference_Notes__c,"Referral Fee"), ISPICKVAL(Reference_Notes__c,"Refund"), ISPICKVAL(Reference_Notes__c,"Payment Re-processed")),0, IF( ISPICKVAL(Payment_Method__c , "Payment"),0,(Outstanding_Balance_as_of_Payout_Date__c-Amount_Adjusted_for_Repayments__c)+Interest_up_to_Last_Repayment__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Interest Accrued up to Payout Date
CustomField.label: Accrued Interest
